intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: GetSafe 360 AI Limited ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website analysis and optimization services.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:

items.1: Name and email address when you create an account
items.2: Payment and billing information for subscription services
items.3: Website URLs that you submit for analysis
items.4: Communications you send to our support team

automated.title: Automatically Collected Information
automated.content: When you use our services, we automatically collect:

items.1: Log data including IP address, browser type, and operating system
items.2: Usage data including features used and time spent on our platform
items.3: Cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience

analyzed.title: Website Analysis Data
analyzed.content: When you analyze a website, we collect:

items.1: Technical data from the analyzed website (HTML, CSS, scripts)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the collected information to:

items.1: Provide, maintain, and improve our AI-powered website optimization services
items.2: Process your payments and manage your subscription
items.3: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
items.4: Respond to your requests, questions, and feedback
items.5: Monitor and analyze usage patterns to improve our AI models
items.6: Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
items.7: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service

disclosure.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
disclosure.intro: We share your information only in the following circumstances:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.content: We share data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, including:

items.2: Cloud hosting providers for data storage and processing
items.3: Authentication services (Clerk) for secure account management
items.4: Analytics tools to understand service usage

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests from public authorities.

businessTransfer.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfer.content: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

consent.title: With Your Consent
consent.content: We may share information for any other purpose with your explicit consent.

security.title: Security Practices
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

items.1: Data encryption in transit using TLS/SSL protocols
items.2: Encrypted storage of sensitive personal and payment information
items.3: Regular security assessments and vulnerability testing
items.4: Access controls limiting employee access to personal data
items.6: Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures

security.note: However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Specifically:

items.1: Account information is retained while your account is active
items.2: Website analysis data is retained for 12 months to enable historical comparisons
items.3: Payment records are retained for 7 years to comply with tax regulations
items.4: Upon account deletion, personal data is anonymized or deleted within 30 days

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.1: Access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
items.2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
items.3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
items.4: Portability: Request transfer of your data in a machine-readable format
items.5: Objection: Object to processing of your personal information
items.6: Restriction: Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances
items.7: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time

yourRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@getsafe360.ai. We will respond within 30 days.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance (EU Users)
gdpr.content: If you are in the European Economic Area (EEA), we process your data based on the following legal grounds:

items.1: Contract: Performance of our service agreement with you
items.2: Consent: Where you have given explicit consent
items.3: Legitimate Interests: For fraud prevention and service improvement
items.4: Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

gdpr.transfer: When we transfer data outside the EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to:

items.1: Keep you signed in to your account
items.3: Analyze how you use our services
items.4: Prevent fraudulent activity and improve security

cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may limit your ability to use certain features.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.mail: For written correspondence, please use the contact form on our website.
